Package dao

Class PatientDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.PatientDAO
public class PatientDAO extends Object
Author:
ikojic000 The PatientDAO class represents the data access object for patients. It provides methods to retrieve and modify patient data in the database.

    • getAllPatients

      public ArrayList<Patient> getAllPatients()
      Retrieves all patients from the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all patients.

    • getPatientByID

      public Patient getPatientByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves a patient from the database by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID of the patient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the patient with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • addPatient

      Parameters:

    • updatePatientPhoto

      public void updatePatientPhoto(Patient patient)
      Updates the profile photo of a patient in the database.
      Parameters:
      patient - - the patient whose photo will be updated

    • deletePatient

      public void deletePatient(Patient patient)
      Deletes a patient from the database.
      Parameters:
      patient - - the patient to be deleted

    • searchPatient

      public ArrayList<Patient> searchPatient(String search)
      Searches for patients based on the provided search string. Uses SQL query to retrieve the data from the database.
      Parameters:
      search - the search string to filter patients
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Patient objects that match the search criteria
